backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Starting next week, I want a weekly 30-min 1:1 with {name}. Afternoons preferred, avoid Fridays. Automatically reschedule on declines or conflicts.

gutts.name: Interpret Start Date as Next Week
gutts.capability: Determine the calendar week immediately following the current week and set it as the start date for scheduling.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the recurring meeting starts in the week after the current one.
gutts.evidence: System correctly identifies that 'starting next week' means the first day of the next calendar week.

gutts.name: Identify Meeting Frequency as Weekly
gutts.capability: Extract and interpret the recurrence pattern from the prompt as weekly.
gutts.user_goal: Schedule the meeting to repeat every week.

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Duration
gutts.capability: Parse the meeting duration as 30 minutes from the prompt.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure each meeting is scheduled for 30 minutes.
gutts.evidence: System sets meeting length to 30 minutes.

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Type as 1:1
gutts.capability: Interpret that the meeting is a one-on-one session.
gutts.user_goal: Schedule a meeting involving only the user and the specified person.
gutts.evidence: System creates an event with exactly two participants.

gutts.name: Identify Participant Name
gutts.capability: Extract the placeholder {name} as the other participant in the meeting.
gutts.user_goal: Invite the correct person to the meeting.
gutts.evidence: System resolves {name} to a valid contact and adds them as an attendee.

gutts.name: Apply Time Preference: Afternoons
gutts.capability: Interpret 'afternoons preferred' and prioritize scheduling between 12:00 PM and 5:00 PM.
gutts.user_goal: Schedule meetings in the afternoon whenever possible.
gutts.evidence: System selects time slots in the afternoon range.

gutts.name: Avoid Fridays
gutts.capability: Exclude Friday from the set of possible meeting days.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure meetings do not occur on Fridays.
gutts.evidence: System does not propose or schedule meetings on Fridays.

gutts.name: Find First Available Slot Next Week
gutts.capability: Search the user's and participant's calendars for the earliest available afternoon slot next week that is not Friday.
gutts.user_goal: Book the first suitable time slot that meets all constraints.
gutts.evidence: System identifies a mutually free afternoon slot next week excluding Friday.

gutts.name: Create Recurring Event
gutts.capability: Schedule the meeting as a recurring weekly event starting from the chosen slot.
gutts.user_goal: Have a standing weekly meeting scheduled.
gutts.evidence: System creates a recurring event with FREQ=WEEKLY and correct start date.

gutts.name: Send Invitations
gutts.capability: Send calendar invitations to the participant and confirm the event with the user.
gutts.user_goal: Notify both parties of the scheduled meeting.
gutts.evidence: Participant receives an invite and user sees confirmation.

gutts.name: Monitor for Declines
gutts.capability: Detect if the participant declines any occurrence of the meeting.
gutts.user_goal: Be aware when the participant cannot attend.
gutts.evidence: System registers a declined response from the participant.

gutts.name: Detect Scheduling Conflicts
gutts.capability: Identify when a scheduled meeting conflicts with another event for either participant.
gutts.evidence: System flags a conflict when another event overlaps the scheduled time.

gutts.name: Automatically Reschedule on Decline
gutts.capability: When a decline is detected, find a new suitable time slot and update the meeting.
gutts.user_goal: Keep the meeting happening even if the original time is declined.
gutts.evidence: System proposes and reschedules to a new available afternoon slot.

gutts.name: Automatically Reschedule on Conflict
gutts.capability: When a conflict is detected, adjust the meeting to a new suitable time slot.
gutts.user_goal: Maintain the recurring meeting without overlaps.
gutts.evidence: System moves the meeting to a non-conflicting afternoon slot.
